author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: If you want to see yours advanced avatar then choose that level of battlefield.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: If you ever feel tired and unsupported then just remember about Shri Krishna.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: If you are fighting for a good means then don't see that who is opposing you, just fight against them.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: Do your duty without attachment to results.

author: Bhagwat Purana
quote: Purity, Patience and Preservance are the essentials to success.

author: Quran
quote: There is no compulsion in religion.

author: Upanishads
quote: Control of the mind is the root of all wisdom.

author: Quran
quote: Indeed, with hardship comes in ease.

author: Dhammapada
quote: Speak the truth. Do not yield to anger.

author: Quran
quote: Indeed, Allah is with those who are patient.

author: Quran
quote: And whoever puts his trust in Allah then he will suffice him.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: One who sees all beings as equal has truly understood.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: Ahimsa parmo dharma dharmaiw himsa tathaiwa cha.
